name: VR Maze (itch)
description:
I've only done 2 or 3 gamejams and wanted to start doing some VR games and figured this would be a good way to start. There is no sound and I made the project in about 3 hours.

This is a VERY simple VR 'game' (using rift, but should work for others?) 

Built using Godot 3.0 Engine! Blender for modeling, and Krita for 2d images and textures.

Instructions are in game. However its very simple just use the sphere connected to your controller to push the purple ball to the goal on the other side of the maze. (Or if your bored like my Wife, just wack it like a golf ball and watch it fly...)

Any controller button should reset the maze.
